abstract.t: This document analysis the use of hashes in SEND, possible threats and the impact of recent attacks on hash functions used by SEND. Current SEND specification [rfc3971] uses the SHA-1 [sha-1] hash algorithm and X.509 certificates [rfc5280] and does not provide support for the hash algorithm agility. The purpose of the document is to provide analysis of possible hash threats and to decide how to encode the hash agility support in SEND.
